#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
long long t,m,n,a;
cin>>t;
string d,b;
cin>>d;
while(t--)
  {
     cin>>b;
     m=b.size();
     while(1)
     {
        a=d.find(b);
        if(a!=string::npos)
          {
           d.erase(a,m);
          }
        else
          break;
     }
   }
n=d.size();
if(n!=0)
  cout<<d;
else
  cout<<0;
return 0;
}
